OrgName: Midwest Backgrounds, Inc DBA: MBI Worldwide
activities: MBI Worldwide is a consumer reporting agency that would receive information regarding criminal searches, motor vehicle records, credit history, employment verification, education verification and drug testing for employment and other permissible purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
privacyprograms: National Association of Professional Background Screeners (NAPBS)
recoursemech: MBI Worldwide commits to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the EU and Switzerland or their authorized representatives.
